title: [Large-Scale] Practice-Centered Online Workshop for Strengthening Educational Technology Professionals' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with foundational educational technology theories or language education fields
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with online tools for project collaboration

learning_goals: Trainees master core competencies of educational technology professionals (instructional design, project management, application of learning theories, etc.) at over 80% proficiency.
Participants analyze at least two collaboration scenarios with diverse stakeholders and propose practical implementation plans.
Participants integrate 21st-century competencies (critical thinking, digital literacy) into language education design and demonstrate methods through project deliverables.

resources: ETCS (European Transfer and Accumulation System) survey tool template
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
